name: discord-player-activity
description: Notify Discord when players join or leave game servers with customizable embeds.
author: Sentinel Team

playerConnectedWebhookUrl.description: Discord webhook URL for player join notifications

playerDisconnectedWebhookUrl.description: Discord webhook URL for player leave notifications

joinEmbedColor.description: Embed color for join notifications (decimal, default: green 0x57F287)

leaveEmbedColor.description: Embed color for leave notifications (decimal, default: red 0xED4245)

showCountryFlag.description: Show country flag emoji based on player's country code
